price: Wͻka (de di fεw sε): ”Yɛ Wura Nyankopͻn fa yεn kyεfa (wͻ asotwee no mu) ma yεn ntεm ansa na Nkontabuo da no (aba)“
arabic: وَقَالُواْ رَبَّنَا عَجِّل لَّنَا قِطَّنَا قَبۡلَ يَوۡمِ ٱلۡحِسَابِ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: waqālū rabbanā ʿajjil lanā qiṭṭanā qabla yawmi al-ḥisābi
